title: Evangeline Lillys Back in a Bikini Plus 7 More Famous Moms Flaunting Impressive Bods After Baby
text:
Evangeline Lilly's Back in a Bikini, Plus 7 More Famous Moms Flaunting Impressive Bods After Baby 
E online Saturday 24th October, 2015 
premiere in June) reminded us that Hollywood is still the center of the universe when it comes to new moms looking particularly impressive in a seemingly inordinate amount of time.Some stars are blessed with that "oh, breastfeeding was all the exercise I needed" metabolism while others get themselves to the gym as soon as they can spare a minute. But either way, the end result tends to be envy-inducing.Whether the baby weight melted off gradually or Mom fast-tracked her fitness schedule, here are seven more celeb moms who have babies at home and abs for days...
